titleStmt.title: The slighted maid: or, The pining lover: with sighs and moans she doth intreat her dear, whilst he seems to be deaf and will not hear: at length his frozen heart begins to melt, being moved with the passion she had felt. To the tune of, I prithee love turn me, &c.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Imperfect: page torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
